org.xbib.marc.io

Interface ChunkStream<S,D>

  • Type Parameters:
    S - the separator type
    D - the data type
    All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.io.Closeable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AlephSequentialInputStream, BiblioMondoInputStream, BufferedSeparatorInputStream, MabDisketteInputStream, PatternInputStream, PicaInputStream, PicaPlainInputStream, SisisInputStream

    public interface ChunkStream<S,D>
extends java.io.Closeable
    A chunk stream.
